operations.command: echo "=== Test 1: ArgoCD Applications ===" && kubectl --context k3d-dev get applications -n argocd -o wide 2>&1
echo "=== Test 2: Kargo Stages ===" && kubectl --context k3d-dev get stages -n nautilus 2>&1

echo "=== Test 3: Pods in All Environments ===" && echo "--- dev ---" && kubectl --context k3d-dev get pods -n nautilus-dev 2>&1 && echo "--- staging ---" && kubectl --context k3d-dev get pods -n nautilus-staging 2>&1 && echo "--- prod ---" && kubectl --context k3d-dev get pods -n nautilus-prod 2>&1
echo "=== Test 4: Kargo Promotions ===" && kubectl --context k3d-dev get promotions -n nautilus --sort-by='{.metadata.creationTimestamp}' 2>&1 | tail -5

echo "=== Test 5: Freight Verification ===" && kubectl --context k3d-dev get freight -n nautilus --sort-by='{.metadata.creationTimestamp}' -o custom-columns='NAME:.metadata.name,VERIFIED_IN:.status.verifiedIn' 2>&1 | tail -3
echo "=== Test 6: Git Repository ===" && git -C /home/sam/.claude/progressive-deploy remote -v 2>&1
echo "=== Test 7: Warehouse Status ===" && kubectl --context k3d-dev get warehouse -n nautilus -o jsonpath='{.items[0].status.conditions[0].message}' 2>&1 && echo ""
echo "=== Test 8: Analysis Templates ===" && kubectl --context k3d-dev get clusteranalysistemplates 2>&1 | wc -l

cd /home/sam/.claude/progressive-deploy && git add .planning/phases/07-multi-env-promotion/07-UAT.md && git commit -m "test(07): complete UAT - 8 passed, 0 issues

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>"

cd /home/sam/.claude/progressive-deploy && echo "=== Git Stats ===" && git log --oneline | wc -l && echo "commits" && git log --oneline | head -5 && echo "" && echo "=== Files ===" && find . -name "*.yaml" -o -name "*.yml" -o -name "*.md" -o -name "*.sh" | wc -l && echo "total files" && echo "" && echo "=== Timeline ===" && git log --format="%ai" --reverse | head -1 && echo "to" && git log --format="%ai" | head -1

cd /home/sam/.claude/progressive-deploy && git add .planning/MILESTONES.md .planning/ROADMAP.md .planning/STATE.md .planning/milestones/v1.0-ROADMAP.md && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
chore: complete v1.0 milestone

- Added MILESTONES.md entry
- Created milestone archive: milestones/v1.0-ROADMAP.md
- Updated ROADMAP.md with completed milestones section
- Updated STATE.md with v1.0 summary

7 phases, 18 plans, 64 commits, 153 files
Shipped: 2026-01-21

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"

cd /home/sam/.claude/progressive-deploy && git tag -a v1.0 -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
v1.0 MVP - Progressive Deployment Orchestrator

Delivered: Complete progressive deployment system with local k3d infrastructure,
Argo CD/Rollouts, analysis templates, trading metrics, auto-rollback with
notifications, and Kargo multi-environment promotion.

Key accomplishments:
- k3d/k3s multi-cluster with Argo CD + Rollouts
- Canary and blue-green deployment strategies
- Golden signals + trading-specific analysis templates
- Auto-rollback with Discord/Linear/GitHub/Sentry integration
- Kargo dev→staging→prod promotion pipeline
- Full GitOps structure with per-environment overlays

Stats: 7 phases, 18 plans, 64 commits, 153 files
Timeline: 2 days (2026-01-19 → 2026-01-21)

See .planning/MILESTONES.md for full details.
EOF
)"
cd /home/sam/.claude/progressive-deploy && git push origin master && git push origin v1.0
